description: PM Modi hails passage of GST in Parliament, terms it as Great Step towards Transformation GST is a Great Step by Team India and a Great Step towards Transparency, says PM Modi Imminent passage of
caption: nm-4.com
message:
A memorable day for our democracy. Today we have taken a historic step in the journey to free the nation from the menace of tax terrorism. GST will benefit the consumer & small business, which are our nation’s strength. Due to GST transparency will be enhanced. Its a win-win. 

Rashtraneeti is much more vital than Rajneeti. Our focus is economic & educational empowerment of the poor & mitigation of poverty. http://nm-4.com/mw6t
